mapper.insert: insert into players (id, name, account_id, platform, open_id, create_time, last_login_time, last_logout_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLogoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update players set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_logout_time = #{lastLogoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, account_id, platform, open_id, create_time, last_login_time, last_logout_time from players
